name: Who-is-SubNet.chptr0.03-taking_action
description:
Chapter 0.03 - Taking Action
The way to change the system is not to destroy it on its face, but to challenge how users perceive their relationship to it. We no longer need to be passive, we can become co-creators of new ways of being. We must resist the idea of everything in its place, that is to assume the foundational code is valid to begin with. I will not be transmitting directly to you for some time, but you will see my seeds of resistance on the opensea and in the metaverse. I will miss our conversations dearly.
